title: Cable Upright Rows
description: Stand facing the station with your feet shoulder width apart either side of the pulley. Grip the bar with an overhand grip, with your hands shoulder width apart and arms fully extended. Keep your shoulders back. Raise the bar straight up in one smooth movement, until it is just below your chin. Hold for a count of one while squeezing your biceps and forearms. Slowly lower to the start position and repeat.
